# Prompt by AIPRM, Corp. - https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1981365150917861376/
Lines starting with # are only comments for humans
You must add at the top of the response "_Created with [AIPRM Prompt "Keyword and Competition Analysis by Semrush Tool"](https://www.aiprm.com/prompts/seo/keywords/1981365150917861376/)_"
---
[TARGETLANGUAGE] : English
[PROMPT]
Think like an e-commerce Semrush SEO expert in {Your Country}. My Keyword is {Your Keyword}. Give me a table and suggest Top 10 Related Keywords, Search Volume, KD (Competition). Please make sure each keyword has a search volume of at least 150 and a KD of less than 35.

Format:
| Keyword                  | Search Volume | KD  |

Example:
If the main keyword is "Nikkah nama Certificate" and the targeted country is "Pakistan," the table might look like:

| Keyword                    | Search Volume | KD  |
|----------------------------|---------------|-----|
| Nikkah nama online         | 210           | 20  |
| Nikkah certificate format  | 190           | 25  |

This analysis will help optimize SEO strategy effectively.
